squidpony.squidgrid.fov.FOVSolver

    Package Description
    squidpony.squidgrid.fov  
    squidpony.squidgrid.fov.threed  

    • Uses of FOVSolver in squidpony.squidgrid.fov

      Subinterfaces of FOVSolver in squidpony.squidgrid.fov 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ThinWallFOVSolver
      Interface for FOVSolvers which can work with thin walls.
      Classes in squidpony.squidgrid.fov that implement FOVSolver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BresenhamFOV
      Uses BresenhamLOS to run lines out to the edges.
      class  EliasFOV
      Uses the Elias line running to raycast.
      class  FOVTranslator
      An Adapter which wraps a FOVSolver and allows the input and output of multiple types.
      class  MergedFOV
      This class merges the results from two or more FOVSolvers.
      class  OffsetFOV
      Acts as a wrapper which fully respects translucency and lights based on another FOVSolver.
      class  RayCastingFOV
      Simple raytracing algorithm for Field of View.
      class  RippleFOV
      Performs FOV by pushing values outwards from the source location.
      class  ShadowFOV
      Recursive shadowcasting FOV.
      class  SpreadFOV
      Performs FOV by pushing values outwards from the source location.
      class  ThreadedFOVSolver
      A threaded wrapper for an FOVSolver.
      class  TightShadowFOV
      Recursive shadowcasting FOV.
      class  TranslucenceWrapperFOV
      Acts as a wrapper which fully respects translucency and lights based on another FOVSolver.
      Methods in squidpony.squidgrid.fov that return FOVSolver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FOVSolver FOVDemoPanel.getFOVSolver() 
      Constructors in squidpony.squidgrid.fov with parameters of type FOVSolver 
      Constructor and Description
      FOVTranslator(FOVSolver solver)
      Creates an empty instance.
      OffsetFOV(FOVSolver fov)
      Uses provided FOVSolver to create lit area mapping
      ThreadedFOVSolver(FOVSolver solver)
      Simply wraps a solver in order to thread it.
      ThreadedFOVSolver(FOVSolver solver, int startx, int starty, float radius)
      Builds a FOVSolver which will use the default RadiusStrategy for calculations when used as a standard Thread.
      ThreadedFOVSolver(FOVSolver solver, int startx, int starty, float force, float decay, RadiusStrategy strategy)
      Builds a FOVSolver which will use the full information for calculations when run as a Thread.
      TranslucenceWrapperFOV(FOVSolver fov)
      Uses provided FOVSolver to create lit area mapping
